Detail from the cover of 'Fun Home,' by Alison Bechdel, published by Mariner Books.

Foreword

Fun Home: A Family Tragicomic by American cartoonist Alison Bechdel is about her childhood to young adult life, as she comes to an understanding of her sexuality, all the while comprehending what her father was to their family.



    Cover of 'Fun Home,' by Alison Bechdel, published by Mariner Books.
